system.requirements: Tau, RT Rank 3+, Intelligence 40+, Tech-Use +10. Proven to display aptitude for technology.

description.value:
Drone handlers, as their name implies, operate a number of the advanced Support and Gun Drones the Tau use ubiquitously. Giving orders to them such that they and their drones may most effectively support their comrades in battle.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Tau Drone Handler Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talents Priority Fire and Swarm Protocols.
